H0.text: Who was the German born private astronomer to George 3rd. Johann Heinrich Wilhelm Dietrich

H1.text: Who was the German born private astronomer to George 3rd. Johann Elert Bode

H2.text: Who was the German born private astronomer to George 3rd. Caroline Herschel's brother-in-law (assuming a familial connection)

H3.text: Who was the German born private astronomer to George 3rd. Herschelian

A4.text: George had the King's Observatory built in Richmond-upon-Thames for his own observations of the 1769 transit of Venus.
